概述   软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个软件包   下一个软件包 框架    无框架    

软件包 storm.dsp

类摘要
DSPTopology Storm topology for Data Stream Processing System This is a simulate topology with a simulated data source RandomMessageSpout Properties is loaded by DSPPropertyUtil class from config.xml
KafkaTopology Storm Topology for Data Stream Processing System A Kafka data source is required.
KafkaTransactionalTopology This is a Storm topology used KafkaTransacionalSpout as a data source Still have issues, so KafkaSpout is recommended
 

概述   软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助
